summary: Completed frontend UI testing for Admin Tenant Features Management page. All 11 features tested and passing. Backend endpoints already verified in iteration_4. Page navigation, tenant selection, feature toggle, plan templates, save/reset functionality all working correctly.

issues: Nested button HTML warning: TenantListItem has copy ID button inside the main button row. Invalid HTML produces React hydration warning. Should change outer button to div or use event.stopPropagation pattern.

passed_tests: ✅ Tenant list loads and shows 13 tenants
✅ Tenant search filtering works (filtered 'Test Tenant' to 3 results)
✅ Clicking a tenant loads its features into checkboxes
✅ Feature checkboxes can be toggled (9 features available)
✅ Plan template dropdown applies feature presets (Starter=2, Pro=5, Enterprise=9 modules)
✅ Save button updates features via PATCH and shows success toast 'Özellikler güncellendi.'
✅ Reset button reverts to initial state
✅ Save/Reset buttons disabled when no changes (dirty state detection)
✅ Non-admin users cannot access admin endpoints (403 'Yetki yok')
✅ Navigation link 'Tenant Özellikleri' visible in admin sidebar
action_items: MINOR: Fix nested button HTML issue in TenantListItem component - change outer <button> to <div> or restructure copy button
critical_code_review_comments: AdminTenantFeaturesPage.jsx:24-53 - TenantListItem uses button inside button which is invalid HTML. React console shows 'In HTML, <button> cannot be a descendant of <button>'. Fix by changing outer element to div with onClick or moving copy button outside.
seed_data_creation: Used existing 13 tenants in test_database. Modified 'Test Tenant seller' features during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Tenant Features page fully functional. Tested with admin@acenta.test/admin123. All CRUD operations work. Minor HTML nesting issue in TenantListItem component (cosmetic). Backend APIs verified via API tests in iteration_4.

ui_test_coverage.page_load: ✅ Page loads with title and description
ui_test_coverage.tenant_list: ✅ 13 tenants displayed with name, slug, status badges
ui_test_coverage.save_functionality: ✅ PATCH API called, success toast shown
ui_test_coverage.access_control: ✅ Non-admin users get 403 on admin endpoints
